Articles.Content:
I have a very strong photographic memory, so I sometimes easily recognise shapes I've seen before.

Now... is it just me, or are the Americas displayed in the terrain on Duna? I mean, North America is almost a perfect match! Just South-America is harder to make out.

Raw photo:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2968042925

Photo with worldmap overlay:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2968047832
Pareidolia. Any vague shape can be recognised as anything
